body.name: DKNY Boys' Jacket – Lightweight Quilted Puffer Coat – Casual Jacket for Boys (Sizes: 8-20)
features: OFFICIALLY LICENSED DKNY: Boys' jacket; The dynamic wardrobe of everything you need to live a New York life-wherever that may be

PUFFER JACKET: This multipurpose and versatile windbreaker jacket is ultra-lightweight so your boy can take it anywhere he goes and stay safe from the elements when the weather changes suddenly; Perfect for winter sports and casual wear, this lightweight boys' jacket comes in a variety of fashionable colors to match your son's unique style

FUNCTIONAL WINDBREAKER: Let your little boy stay warm without being too bulky; Deep side pockets cover chilly hands and keep valuables safe; With this fashionable puffer jacket for boys, your son will enjoy a warm yet lightweight insulation against the elements; Large, comfortable hood and collar guarantee extra warmth and grant an additional level of protection against unfavorable weather conditions

DURABLE FABRIC: We fashioned this boys' packable bubble jacket from wind and water resistant fabric that will ensure your boy stays comfortable when the temperature drops; Great everyday jacket when hanging out with friends, going back to school, or playing at the park; Our packable puffer jacket combines modern fashion with outstanding functionality and convenience

COMFORT FIT: Comfortable and extra warm windbreaker comes in a variety of sizes to ensure a perfect fit; With several classic color options to choose from, including black, grey, camo, and navy, this boys' puffer is a perfect gift idea for sons, brothers, nephews, grandsons, cousins, and friends
body.description: DKNY Boys' Jacket - Packable Bubble Puffer Windbreaker Jacket is a great choice for every fashionable little boy when the temperature drops. Let your son stay comfortable on chilly days with a lightweight, extra warm, and packable windbreaker jacket, designed with fashion and comfort in mind. Featuring deep pockets to protect his hands from the cold, this stylish outerwear is perfect for school, going to the mall, or having fun at the slope. GREAT INSULATION: Your little boy will stay on top of winter weather without being too bulky while the comfy hood and large collar will make his life so much easier during the unpredictable fall and winter seasons. PACKABLE: Go from chilly to comfy in seconds. This packable windbreaker helps little boys adapt perfectly to the weather outside and keeps them warm and stylish every day. DURABLE: Whether he's hanging out on a cold day or having fun in the snow with family and friends, you won't have to worry about ripping and fading. The durable fabric will last through all his outdoor adventures and winter activities. LIGHTWEIGHT: Our water and wind-resistant windbreaker puffer jacket for boys delivers proper protection against the elements without adding too much weight on his shoulders. EASY TO CLEAN: Simply machine wash and tumble dry; Please Reference the Variations for All Available Sizes & Colors! DKNY Offers Premium Clothing at Affordable Prices because we value every customer that visits our listings! Stop by Our Storefront to See the Rest of Our Great Deals; we're confident you're going to find items that anyone who needs a gift will absolutely love and adore!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow this is nice
reviews.reviewText: This jacket is sleek and clean looking. My son age 8 instantly loved it. Looks and feels like quality. We got the black with blue inside the hood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter coat
reviews.reviewText: Love how fits nice and comfortable and warm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought it as a gift for my grandson, he loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came right on time. Looks great feels great. It's lightweight but good enough to keep my 12 yr old warm. Best to layer with a fleece underneath if your looking for extra coverage from the cold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it.Its DKNYIt's light weightmost I like it has inner pockets.I tries to look for made in USA, but most of them do not has inner pockets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Within the first week the coat had ripped a hole in the right arm pit. Than the zipper came off, and I fixed it with pliers however the material used for the zipper was so cheap it fell back off a few days later. The strings they have dangling from the pockets also got caught on everything and were ripped off. Don't waste your money or time purchasing this. Coat was returned with zipper taped to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I only returned the coat because my son did not like bubble coats. Otherwise, it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for winter
reviews.reviewText: Love the smooth feel and that there is insulation inside! Not temp rated but definitely a great winter jacket.
